title: Pay contractors
emptyTableDescription: There are no active contractors with completed onboarding. Add and onboard contractors before creating payments.
paymentSpeedNotice: Direct deposit payments submitted before 4pm PT on a business day will take 2 business days to complete

alerts.noContractorPayments: Please add at least one contractor payment to continue.

editContractorPayment.title: Edit contractor pay
editContractorPayment.subtitle: Edit contractor's hours, additional earnings, and reimbursements. Inputs not applicable to this contractor are disabled. Please click "Done" to apply the change.

wireDetailsBanner.title: To make payment, wire funds by {{time}} on {{date}}
wireDetailsBanner.description: We can't pay your contractors until we get your wire. It may take time to get from your bank to ours, so we recommend sending it as soon as you can.
wireDetailsBanner.confirmationDescription: We'll notify you once we've received your wire transfer.

successState.title: Payment group created successfully
successState.message: {{count}} contractor payment has been successfully scheduled.
successState.message_other: {{count}} contractor payments have been successfully scheduled.

alerts.submitPaymentsDeadline: To pay your contractors by {{checkDate}}, submit payments by {{debitDate}}.

submissionBlockers.genericBlockerMessage: This payment cannot be submitted. Please contact support for assistance.

fastAchOptions.description: Payment can still be funded by selecting one of the options below. The selected funding method will only be used for this payment and will not apply to future payments.
fastAchOptions.wireDescription: Pay your contractors on time by sending a wire transfer. We'll provide instructions on the next step.
fastAchOptions.directDepositDescription: Delay contractor pay date by four days and process using regular debits.

fast_ach_threshold_exceeded.title: You have exceeded the limit at which you can process {{days}} contractor payments.

needs_earned_access_for_fast_ach.title: You have not yet earned access to faster contractor payments.
